an3.63:6.9.pli: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto caṅkamāmi, dibbo me eso tasmiṁ samaye caṅkamo hoti.
an3.63:6.9.en: When I’m practicing like this, if I walk, at that time I walk like the gods.

an3.63:6.10.pli: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto tiṭṭhāmi, dibbaṁ me etaṁ tasmiṁ samaye ṭhānaṁ hoti.
an3.63:6.10.en: When I’m practicing like this, if I stand, at that time I stand like the gods.

an3.63:6.11.pli: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto nisīdāmi, dibbaṁ me etaṁ tasmiṁ samaye āsanaṁ hoti.
an3.63:6.11.en: When I’m practicing like this, if I sit, at that time I sit like the gods.

an3.63:6.12.pli: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto seyyaṁ kappemi, dibbaṁ me etaṁ tasmiṁ samaye uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ hoti.
an3.63:6.12.en: When I’m practicing like this, if I lie down, at that time I lie down like the gods.

an3.63:8.9.pli: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto caṅkamāmi, brahmā me eso tasmiṁ samaye caṅkamo hoti.
an3.63:8.9.en: When I’m practicing like this, if I walk, at that time I walk like Brahmā.

an3.63:8.12.pli: seyyaṁ kappemi, brahmaṁ me etaṁ tasmiṁ samaye uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ hoti.
an3.63:8.12.en: When I’m practicing like this, if I lie down, at that time I lie down like Brahmā.

an3.63:10.9.pli: So ce ahaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evaṁbhūto caṅkamāmi, ariyo me eso tasmiṁ samaye caṅkamo hoti.
an3.63:10.9.en: When I’m practicing like this, if I walk, at that time I walk like the noble ones.

an3.63:10.12.pli: seyyaṁ kappemi, ariyaṁ me etaṁ tasmiṁ samaye uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ hoti.
an3.63:10.12.en: When I’m practicing like this, if I lie down, at that time I lie down like the noble ones.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 3
7. The Great Chapter
63. At Venāgapura

mn78:9.8.pli: Evaṁ paṭipanno akusalānaṁ sīlānaṁ nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti;
mn78:9.8.en: ‘Someone practicing like this is practicing for the cessation of unskillful behaviors.’

mn78:9.16.pli: Evaṁ paṭipanno kusalānaṁ sīlānaṁ nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti;
mn78:9.16.en: ‘Someone practicing like this is practicing for the cessation of skillful behaviors.’

mn78:9.24.pli: Evaṁ paṭipanno akusalānaṁ saṅkappānaṁ nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti;
mn78:9.24.en: ‘Someone practicing like this is practicing for the cessation of unskillful thoughts.’

mn78:9.32.pli: Evaṁ paṭipanno kusalānaṁ saṅkappānaṁ nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti;
mn78:9.32.en: ‘Someone practicing like this is practicing for the cessation of skillful thoughts.’

mn78:10.19.pli: Evaṁ paṭipanno kho, thapati, akusalānaṁ sīlānaṁ nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
mn78:10.19.en: Someone practicing like this is practicing for the cessation of unskillful behaviors.

mn78:11.19.pli: Evaṁ paṭipanno kho, thapati, kusalānaṁ sīlānaṁ nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
mn78:11.19.en: Someone practicing like this is practicing for the cessation of skillful behaviors.

mn78:12.20.pli: Evaṁ paṭipanno kho, thapati, akusalānaṁ saṅkappānaṁ nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
mn78:12.20.en: Someone practicing like this is practicing for the cessation of unskillful thoughts.

mn78:13.20.pli: Evaṁ paṭipanno kho, thapati, kusalānaṁ saṅkappānaṁ nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
mn78:13.20.en: Someone practicing like this is practicing for the cessation of skillful thoughts.

an3.60:2.5.pli: ‘ethāyaṁ maggo ayaṁ paṭipadā yathāpaṭipanno ahaṁ anuttaraṁ brahmacariyogadhaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedemi;
an3.60:2.5.en: ‘Come, this is the path, this is the practice. Practicing like this, I realized the supreme culmination of the spiritual life with my own insight, and I make it known.
